story.title: CPS Public Hearing: Casals Elementary AUSL Turnaround
story.description: A hearing for the proposed Reconstitution/Turnaround of Pablo Casals Elementary School. The turnaround would be run by AUSL (Academy for Urban School Leadership). Held in the board room of the Chicago Public Schools administration building. Monday, January 30th, 2012 5:30 - 7:30 PM

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related. I’m moving my stories to Wakelet https://wakelet.com/@joshkalov

meta.text: Fredrick Bates

quote.text: So the hearing ends with EVERYONE speaking out against the Casals Turnaround. No one spoke in support. #cps
